ygData.subject: Re: instill doubt
ygData.msgSnippet: You can practice instill doubt on anything, other ppl, mobs nowhere near you, conning whatever color.  It takes forever for it to go up.  Mine is at 105 right
ygData.messageBody:
You can practice instill doubt on anything, other ppl, mobs nowhere near you,
conning whatever color. It takes forever for it to go up. Mine is at 105
right now and works maybe 1 in 10 times. It is no good in dungeons, the mob
will run and get friends to bring back. Only good thing I have seen for it
is if a mob is ensnared and you are fighting in the open where there are
hardly any mobs around it and it will run so you can smack it in the back.

Kanja
Rodcet Nife
